duties_responsibilities.duty: Support R&D and analytical teams with general administrative activities and other requested tasks.
Ensure supply needs are met, including office and lab supply inventory and ordering.
Organize and maintain department filing systems, including potentially confidential data.
Coordinate meetings, maintain calendars, assist in travel arrangements, and provide clerical support as necessary.
Manage incoming and outgoing mail, product samples, and coordinate building maintenance as needed.
Handle invoices, purchase order requests, and organize and tidy common areas.
Respond to inquiries for information according to general guidelines and perform routine assignments under limited supervision.
Draft product evaluation protocols, assist in running product evaluations, and engage internal employees to participate in evaluations.
Prepare grammatically correct correspondence, reports, tables, and analyses, and enter or remove small stability samples on a scheduled basis.
Assist in special projects as assigned and recommend improvements on administrative procedures.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or higher; MS Office Outlook, Excel, Word Proficiency
